Gadus S4 OGXK United States EN TDG V4.1 23-Aug-2021

packs.name: Drums 180 kg Open head + liner Steel Shell Red, Shell Yellow (1) WL

marketing: Shell Gadus S4 OGXK is primarily designed for use in heavyly loaded applications, and operations under arctic conditions, in mining equipment, shovels, draglines and excavators in open cut operations.  Shell Gadus S4 OGXK is based on Aluminium Complex soap thickener and high viscosity semi-synthetic base oil containing enhanced extreme pressure and antiwear chemistry. Diluent is used to ensure low-temperature pumpability.
